name: StarLancer [SDC]
description:
Starlancer is a simulation game developed by Digital Anvil and Warthog. It came out on 31-03-2000. It was published by Microsoft Studios. On review aggregator Metacritic, Starlancer has a score of 78. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Starlancer on Dreamcast and PC.
It was produced by Chris Roberts, Jason Blundell and Mike Arkin. Chris Roberts, Dave Anthony, Eric Peterson and Jason Blundell directed the game. Ian Livingstone and Martin Galway scored the game.
